alert.note: Alert for Piscataquis; Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 5:23PM EDT until July 21 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Piscataquis County in north central Maine... Somerset County in west central Maine... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 523 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Billy-Jack Depot, or 31 miles south of Saint Juste, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Baker Lake and Billy-Jack Depot. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
